hero.title: 前端开发工程师
hero.description: 我是一名全栈开发者，拥有扎实的React前端开发技能和丰富的项目经验。毕业于奥克兰大学，曾担任软件开发实习生，有能力构建现代化、高效的Web应用。

about.title: 关于我
about.subtitle: 前端开发工程师
about.p1: 我是郭圣元，一名前端开发工程师，目前在奥克兰大学攻读信息技术硕士学位。我拥有扎实的计算机科学教育背景和实际的软件开发经验。
about.p2: 在我的职业生涯中，我专注于React生态系统，开发了各种响应式Web应用程序。我熟悉现代前端开发工具和技术，包括React、Redux、Tailwind CSS等。我还具备全栈开发能力，了解Node.js和Express等后端技术。
about.p3: 我对技术充满热情，特别是前端开发和人工智能领域。目前我正在寻找能够发挥我技术专长的前端开发职位，同时希望不断学习和成长。
about.education.desc: 奥克兰大学信息技术硕士学位，计算机科学本科学位
about.projects.desc: 参与开发多个基于React的Web应用，包括Musichat流媒体播放网站

job1.desc1: Over 10 years of experience in software engineering and DevOps, with a strong background in large-scale system architecture and automation.
job1.desc2: Previously held roles at Baidu and Tencent, specializing in backend, and infrastructure optimization for high-performance platforms.

job2.desc1: Specialist in microservices, high-concurrency design, and full-stack development.
job2.desc2: Capable of delivering scalable, high-performance solutions tailored to diverse business needs.
job2.desc3: Possesses long-term industry experience in computer vision.

job3.desc1: Master's degree in Artificial Intelligence, with deep expertise in machine learning models, data analysis, large language models, and natural language processing.
job3.desc2: Currently serving as an AI developer at the largest engineering consultancy company in the Asia-Pacific region.
job3.desc3: Delivering AI-driven solutions to enhance operational efficiency and decision-making.

job4.desc1: Experienced in website design, cloud infrastructure, and API development.
job4.desc2: Track record of delivering multiple responsive, high-traffic websites.
job4.desc3: AWS-certified and skilled in secure, scalable deployments.

education.title: 教育背景
education.desc1: 目前在奥克兰大学攻读信息技术硕士学位，专注于高级软件开发和web应用程序开发技术。
education.desc2: 在奥克兰大学完成了计算机科学本科学位，学习了计算机科学的基础理论和实践技能。
education.achievement1: Musichat项目获得2024年奥克兰大学最佳学生项目奖
education.achievement2: 参与开发的MediMate系统在医疗健康科技创新大赛中获得认可
